claim:
Methods
One reviewer (A.L.) searched Medline and Embase for articles related to the arthroscopic treatment of bipartite patella published on or before March 8, 2020, using the following subject headings and their related key terms: “bipartite patella” and “arthroscopy.” Figure 1 outlines the search strategy used.
title: Figure 1.
caption: Search strategy.

claim: Of these, 130 articles were removed after title review, 19 after abstract review, and 3 after full-text review, resulting in 11 articles‡ (43 patients) being included (Figure 2).
title: Figure 2.
caption: Flowchart of article inclusion.
